item.title: Buried Blog Posts
item.description: Highlights Reduce time to collect blog post links from hours to seconds. Received 10+ donations and 400+ endorsements (and counting). The problem The user homepage design on Matters (a Chinese blogging platform) fits about three articles. Users' content gets buried in almost no time. Some users started to create posts that act as content pages. However, collecting blog posts by hand requires a lot of time and energy.

item.title: How to read a GraphQL API documentation
item.description: It is my first time reading GraphQL API documentation. I don’t know if they are all this complicated so I wrote a post just in case. You can find the API documentation and the sandbox at https://server.matters.news/playground. My goal today is to fetch all articles for a user. When you first open the documentation (Click “DOCS” on your right-hand side), you can see a “Queries” section and a “Mutation” section. The former doesn’t require any authentication, vice versa.
